Title: La Ronde
Plot: Hank turns down an offer of sex which is unthinkable (for him). Karen gives in to Ashby's asking and agrees to date him. Charlie and Daisy have a bonding moment over the film Dirty Dancing, while Marcy is still in rehab.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Paula Marshall, Angus MacFadyen, Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Madchen Amick
